td.p: And the renter of the car shown in the contract is a present and a fine guarantee on all the consequences of the car from Rents, expenses, repairs, etc., and I sign:

I, the renter of the car, acknowledge that I have read the notes in the contract and the terms and conditions behind it, and that this is done Final accounting according to the prices indicated in the contract without any reduction and that I agree to it and pledge to pay all Traffic violations, so I sign and I am ready to bear all costs and financial amounts as a result Accident, theft or repairs. The office also has the right to tow the car after the expiry of the contract term.

Renters Signature To Returned The Car Agreement Terminates And Certificated And Adjustment Account
